Description: Silver lamp in two main sections: lower section in the form of bowl with ridged sides; inscribed with Demotic script; issuing a hollow shaft with an everted rim and a circular upper section(the centre missing) inscribed around the edge with Hieratic script; also five separated fragments.
Curator's comments: Published: Vleeming, Studia Demotica 5, No. 49, pp. 40-41, pl. II.
Condition: broken - two main pieces, some fragments have become separated
